# NSVerticalDirection

**Enumeration**

A direction on the vertical axis.

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen enum NSVerticalDirection
```

## Structures

- **NSVerticalDirection.Set**: An efficient set of vertical directions.

## Enumeration Cases

- **NSVerticalDirection.down**: The downward direction.
- **NSVerticalDirection.up**: The upwards direction.

## Enumerations

- **NSCursor.FrameResizePosition**: The position along the perimeter of a rectangular frame (its edges and corners) from which it’s resized.
- **NSHorizontalDirection**: An absolute direction on the horizontal axis.
- **NSSharingCollaborationMode**: Represents the types of sharing (collaborating on an item vs. sending a copy of the item) The share picker supports up to two modes, each of which corresponds to one of these types
- **NSImage.DynamicRange**: Describes how High Dynamic Range (HDR) image content displays.
- **NSTextCursorAccessoryPlacement**
- **NSWritingToolsBehavior**: Constants that specify the Writing Tools experience for the underlying view.
- **NSWritingToolsResultOptions**: Constants to specify what type of content to allow in Writing Tools suggestions or rewrites.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- CaseIterable
- Copyable
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
